page.title: 08FARMING
page.content: New Moor Farm is a mixed farm of six hundred and seventy two acres.It is managed by Mr Thorogood who has been a farmer for seventeen years.His father has been a farmer for forty six years but only in Southminster for twenty years.They grow{wheat, barley, sugar {beet, rape, broad beans, greens, {rhubarb, sweetcorn, and asparagus.}You have to stop picking asparagus on June 21st (longest day) or it will not grow next year. In the barn there were tractors and irrigators and all the machinery needed on the farm.An engineer was working on a Fendt tractor. It has to be serviced every thirty hours.
